meanings.sent1: The unwatched garden grew wild with untamed flowers.
meanings.sent2: The unwatched experiment yielded unexpected results.
meanings.sent3: The unwatched puppy caused chaos in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her unwatched emotions bubbled to the surface unexpectedly.
meanings.sent5: The unwatched fire spread quickly through the dry forest.

meanings.definition: Not looked at or paid attention to
meanings.sent1: The unwatched movie played silently on the screen.
meanings.sent2: The unwatched book gathered dust on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The unwatched clock ticked away in the empty room.
meanings.sent4: Her unwatched talent remained hidden from the world.
meanings.sent5: The unwatched painting faded in the dim light of the attic.
